metadata.description: Mission Impossible meets Grimm Fairy Tales in this new intense spy mini-series from Zenescope! Britney Waters aka, Red Riding Hood, is recruited by a secret government agency to help take down a rogue organization that is determined to take out any and all Highborn threats across the globe. Using the codename Red Agent, Britney must infiltrate the mysterious organization and ultimately confront a seemingly unstoppable weapon called "The Knight"-a sadistic laboratory-enhanced warrior whose sole purpose is to seek and destroy. Don't miss this brand new Grimm Universe spy series from Zenescope!
metadata.name: Red Agent
